functional_jobs.job_statement: When new users visit the website, I want to guide them through how to use it, so I can ensure they have a successful experience from the start.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Not all new users attend orientation, and personal walkthroughs are not scalable.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A self-service guide or walkthrough (video/app) that is accessible to all new users.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Increased user satisfaction and engagement from new users, as evidenced by feedback and usage metrics.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When using the website, I want to feel confident and capable, so I can enjoy the experience without frustration.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Personal interactions or finding information through trial and error.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feelings of confusion or frustration due to poor navigation and unclear information.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless and intuitive experience that boosts my confidence in using the website.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling more confident and less frustrated after improvements are made.

social_jobs.job_statement: When participating in events, I want to be seen as knowledgeable and engaged, so I can foster positive connections with others.
social_jobs.current_solution: Attending events and discussions with knowledgeable peers.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in finding relevant events or understanding event details can hinder engagement.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Easier access to event information that allows me to participate meaningfully.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Increased participation in events and positive feedback from peers regarding engagement.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When browsing events, I want clear information on availability and pricing, so I can make informed decisions about participation.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Current event listings with limited information.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Lack of clarity on waiting lists, event dates, and pricing leads to missed opportunities.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Comprehensive event listings that include availability, pricing, and dates.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Higher user satisfaction with event selection process and increased event participation.
